title: Bugsplat issue
body:
So ever since two days ago my league has been giving me a bugsplat issue and i haven't heard anything from Riot after I posted on the support page so i'm reaching out to you guys.

I've done everything on [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)  page a few times over and also reinstalled a few times. 

I'll upload my logs if need be and as for a description of what is happening I'll copy and paste from my support ticket and my two updates as well.

"After champ select the game goes to a black screen then crashes out in a bugsplat. I've tried all the stuff on your support page so i'm posting here to see if you guys can help me with this problem. My logs will be uploaded below but I couldn't find the xml file that was mentioned in the bugsplat itself."

"Update: My pbe launches just fine as i just updated it and tried it, also on a side note don't really like Kled."

"Update: new windows updated and new patch today and still not working. Bugsplating in the same spot."

replies.body:
I have the same issues and have fixed my problem. I downloaded and installed "Adobe Air" since league prefers this program. I then reinstalled League and am now able to log into games without the bugsplat.

Hopefully this helps you

Seems like there has been an issue since a patch since I am getting the same Bug on my end.  It has been 4 days for me and now I'm in a  Lower Que due to Leaver Buster.  Very frustrating since I was planning on playing ranked que's till the end of the season.

Since you've already tried the steps in our Bugsplat guide, I recommend your next step to be a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our tech team. If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) then attach them to your submission, you'll give our team the context necessary to help you find a permanent solution.

Let me know if you have any questions.
